ygData.subject: Re: Dark returns...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You were wrong Burning Hammer.  I cared about you.  I came here with you didn t I.  I was willing to stay here, if I ever got out of the CR chamber,

Subject: Re: Dark returns...

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 138
From: Rudra656@...

::Lambda::
    "You were wrong Burning Hammer.  I cared about you.  I came here with you 
didn't I.  I was willing to stay here, if I ever got out of the CR chamber, 
because of you.  I had a lot of time to think inside of the chamber.  I 
realized how wrong it was of me to enjoy other peoples pain.  I also realized 
that I needed you.  I missed you too."  She reaches out to brush the tear 
from his face.
